short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We help you stay productive, analyzing your text and keeping you within self established boudaries and deadlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Metrics by Authorship, helps you to measure your productivity while you are writing, giving you stats based on the milestones you select, it can be "Words per Day", "Words per Month", or a "Milestone". Metrics automatically get the words while you're working in a particular document, you can always "pause" or "resume" your current project. Metrics by Authorship works perfectly in Google Docs and Wordpress.
